thread.title: Very pleased with this new EVEN hotel. - Review
thread.title_full: Very pleased with this new EVEN hotel. - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chris N
title: Very pleased with this new EVEN hotel. - Review
text:
The staff was very pleasant (especially Jon) and helpful throughout my one day stay. The facilities were top notch at this modern and secure hotel. I was especially impressed with the health theme expressed and the room layout was very well thought out. Clean and comfortable you could not ask for more at this modestly priced hotel. I will book this EVEN hotel on my next trip to NYC.
Room Tip: Not observed. See more room tips Green Features: Most impressed with exercise equipment and exercise routine found on the TV.
